php.LBL_HAVE_BACKUP_DATABASE: I have back-up copy of database
php.LBL_HAVE_BACKUP_FILES: I have back-up copy of files
php.LBL_MIGRATION_ERROR: Error occurred during your attempt to migrate
php.LBL_DESCRIPTION_CONDITIONS:
Warning! During the migration you will loose all data related to the following modules: MailManager, EmailTemplates, Workflows.
Please be aware that migration is still in its testing stage so you should make all possible back-up copies and follow security procedures in case of any unforeseen events.

js.LBL_PASS_LACK_OF_LOWERCASE_LETTERS: The password must contain lowercase letters
